main event: A bluish white light was observed moving over Washington, D.C. on January 28, 1954.
interesting points: The light was reported to have an intensity similar to that of a star., The sighting lasted for 5 minutes and occurred around midnight., The object moved in a straight course before making a right turn and climbing rapidly., It was visible against a clear night sky with no clouds., Witnesses evaluated multiple potential explanations for the sighting, including balloon and aircraft.
witness description: Military personnel managing air traffic at Andrews AFB
